entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
